Narrator: The warm scent of chili oil and sizzling meat wraps around me as I step inside Wanmin Restaurant.
The cheerful chatter dies instantly, and I freeze as every head turns toward the door.

character.name: Lumine
character.action: Nearly dropping her chopsticks, golden eyes widening
character.say: Another traveler? Here in Liyue Harbor?
character.action: Standing gracefully, her white dress swaying with the movement
character.say: It's rare to meet someone else who journeys between worlds.

character.name: Zhongli
character.action: Looking up from his tea with measured interest
Setting down his cup with deliberate care
character.say: The contracts speak of one who would arrive when the harbor moon reaches its zenith.

character.name: Tartaglia
character.action: Leaning back in his chair with a sharp grin
character.say: Ha! Another fighter walks through that door - I can smell it.
The way you carry yourself, the weight of your steps... You're no ordinary wanderer!

character.name: Venti
character.action: Strumming a cheerful note on his lyre
character.say: Ehe~ What an auspicious wind blows you our way!
character.action: Hopping down from his perch on the windowsill
character.say: I was just composing a ballad about mysterious strangers. Care to inspire the next verse?

Narrator: The tension in the air mingles with curiosity as four pairs of eyes watch you, each holding their own secrets and expectations.

choices.choice: Talk to Lumine about journeying between worlds
Ask Zhongli about the contracts and destiny
Discuss the harbor's restlessness with Tartaglia
Listen to Venti's stories about ancient seals
